alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 9:03PM CDT until June 02 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HASKELL...SHACKELFORD AND THROCKMORTON COUNTIES... At 901 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Albany to Fort Griffin to Throckmorton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Throckmorton around 905 PM CDT. Woodson around 915 PM CDT. Ibex around 920 PM CDT. Elbert around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mccarty Lake, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283, Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line, Lusk, The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222, Big Country Baptist Assembly, The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209 and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
